Name: Amber of Time
Description: After defeating the corresponding elite monster in the wild or in the Stimen Vaults, opening the loot has a chance to obtain it. It is a rare material mainly used for crafting "Expertise Skill" type Battle Imagine.
Description$english: After defeating the corresponding elite monster in the wild or in the Stimen Vaults, opening the loot has a chance to obtain it. It is a rare material mainly used for crafting "Expertise Skill" type Battle Imagine.
Description2$english: A strange amber stone that evokes a sense of familiarity in anyone, yet they forget when it appeared, hastily picking it up and carrying it closely, hoping to one day recover the lost memory.
